name: BAD TRIP (BLOOD TRIP SERIES #2 of 6)
description:
Psychedelics are not all fun and games. Sometimes they start off great (GOOD TRIP), but then take us to challenging spaces where things might be uncomfortable. Or downright terrifying. Did you check your set and setting before you started?

Some people believe there are no bad trips, and that what we characterize as such are simply aspects of our psyche that the drug showed us that we were not ready to face. What do you think?

Second in a series of six. You can only receive this piece by collecting GOOD TRIP, the first in the series. You will also receive the other four images for free. Plus, one collector will be randomly selected to be gifted a 1/1 edition of the frozen blood macro photography shot that was the sole input for all the images in this series.

2238x3968 JPG

Minted July 24th, 2021. Verify via Twitter account @tormential and/or Instagram account @_tormential_ and/or tormential.tez
